Preterit Intransitive.turoyo: qṭəʕlanlišone, bas-yo, annaqlatayəb 511; prs 181/11; mədḥzele l-u=malaxo <…> d-tayəb w-məʕtarafle b-aloho, šləḥleaǧ=ǧul-ayḏe w-hiwile l-u=moro
translations: ‘As the angel saw that he had [truly] repented and had professed God he took off his clothes and gave them back to [their] owner’; 43/43 [MT]; 43/55
